name: geojson-extract-geometries
description: Extract geometries from geojson for given basic geometry type.

scripts.build-debug: browserify geojson-extract-geometries.js --debug --standalone GeoJSONExtractGeometries | exorcist dist/geojson-extract-geometries.js.map > dist/geojson-extract-geometries.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min

author: Gagan Bansal <gaganbansal123@gmail.com>
